As president, I will raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour and make sure it’s a living wage. 

It’s unconscionable that in 99% of the counties in America, a minimum-wage worker working full-time still cannot afford the market rate for a one-bedroom apartment.

Some infuriating facts as we recognize #EqualPayDay:
 
-women are paid on average just 80 cents to the dollar a man makes
-this costs women more than $900 billion a year
-the disparity is wider for most women of color
 
Unacceptable. Congress must pass the Paycheck Fairness Act.

3/8: A wall will help funnel traffic to monitored areas & make it easier for Border Patrol. 

But it’s well known in Cent Am that if you arrive with children & claim asylum you have very good chance of being released with a work permit pending a hearing 2 years from now.

5/8: But many Democrats want all migrants claiming asylum be given hearing & released pending that hearing. Even if it serves as a magnet for more children to be brought on that dangerous journey. 

And they accuse anyone who disagrees of being anti-immigrant.

Nothing compassionate about luring them to bring their children (or send them with strangers) on a long, dangerous & illegal journey.
